targets.queryText: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(s.period_type, 'WEEK_ROLLING', 'WTD'), 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'MTD'), 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'QTD'), 'YEAR_ROLLING', 'YTD') AS period, s.period_start_date || ' -> ' || s.period_end_date AS range, s.mv_end AS end_mv, s.mv_delta, s.monthly_income_end AS end_income, s.monthly_income_delta AS income_delta, s.twr_period_pct AS twr_pct, s.pnl_period AS pnl, s.goal_progress_end - s.goal_progress_start AS goal_delta_pct, s.holding_count_end AS holdings FROM period_summary s WHERE s.period_type IN ('WEEK_ROLLING', 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'YEAR_ROLLING') AND s.period_end_date = (SELECT MAX(s2.period_end_date) FROM period_summary s2 WHERE s2.period_type = s.period_type) ORDER BY CASE s.period_type WHEN 'WEEK_ROLLING' THEN 1 WHEN 'MONTH_ROLLING' THEN 2 WHEN 'QUARTER_ROLLING' THEN 3 WHEN 'YEAR_ROLLING' THEN 4 END;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(s.period_type, 'WEEK_ROLLING', 'WTD'), 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'MTD'), 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'QTD'), 'YEAR_ROLLING', 'YTD') AS period, s.period_start_date || ' -> ' || s.period_end_date AS range, s.mv_end AS end_mv, s.mv_delta, s.monthly_income_end AS end_income, s.monthly_income_delta AS income_delta, s.twr_period_pct AS twr_pct, s.pnl_period AS pnl, s.goal_progress_end - s.goal_progress_start AS goal_delta_pct, s.holding_count_end AS holdings FROM period_summary s WHERE s.period_type IN ('WEEK_ROLLING', 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'YEAR_ROLLING') AND s.period_end_date = (SELECT MAX(s2.period_end_date) FROM period_summary s2 WHERE s2.period_type = s.period_type) ORDER BY CASE s.period_type WHEN 'WEEK_ROLLING' THEN 1 WHEN 'MONTH_ROLLING' THEN 2 WHEN 'QUARTER_ROLLING' THEN 3 WHEN 'YEAR_ROLLING' THEN 4 END;

targets.queryText: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(s.period_type, 'WEEK_ROLLING', 'WTD'), 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'MTD'), 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'QTD'), 'YEAR_ROLLING', 'YTD') AS period, s.vol_30d_end AS vol_30d, s.vol_30d_delta AS vol_delta, s.sortino_1y_end AS sortino, s.sortino_1y_delta AS sortino_delta, s.sharpe_1y_end AS sharpe, s.sharpe_1y_delta AS sharpe_delta, s.max_drawdown_1y_pct_end AS max_dd, s.max_drawdown_1y_pct_delta AS max_dd_delta, s.portfolio_risk_quality_end AS risk_quality FROM period_summary s WHERE s.period_type IN ('WEEK_ROLLING', 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'YEAR_ROLLING') AND s.period_end_date = (SELECT MAX(s2.period_end_date) FROM period_summary s2 WHERE s2.period_type = s.period_type) ORDER BY CASE s.period_type WHEN 'WEEK_ROLLING' THEN 1 WHEN 'MONTH_ROLLING' THEN 2 WHEN 'QUARTER_ROLLING' THEN 3 WHEN 'YEAR_ROLLING' THEN 4 END;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(s.period_type, 'WEEK_ROLLING', 'WTD'), 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'MTD'), 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'QTD'), 'YEAR_ROLLING', 'YTD') AS period, s.vol_30d_end AS vol_30d, s.vol_30d_delta AS vol_delta, s.sortino_1y_end AS sortino, s.sortino_1y_delta AS sortino_delta, s.sharpe_1y_end AS sharpe, s.sharpe_1y_delta AS sharpe_delta, s.max_drawdown_1y_pct_end AS max_dd, s.max_drawdown_1y_pct_delta AS max_dd_delta, s.portfolio_risk_quality_end AS risk_quality FROM period_summary s WHERE s.period_type IN ('WEEK_ROLLING', 'MONTH_ROLLING', 'QUARTER_ROLLING', 'YEAR_ROLLING') AND s.period_end_date = (SELECT MAX(s2.period_end_date) FROM period_summary s2 WHERE s2.period_type = s.period_type) ORDER BY CASE s.period_type WHEN 'WEEK_ROLLING' THEN 1 WHEN 'MONTH_ROLLING' THEN 2 WHEN 'QUARTER_ROLLING' THEN 3 WHEN 'YEAR_ROLLING' THEN 4 END;
